channel.title: Connection problems need help please
channel.description:
whenever i try to run moparscape and it goes to the redbar (the loading thingy) it always has connection errors and has to retry.. if anyone else has this problem please help. or if you know how to fix it
not sure if this is the right thread.. if not please tell me which one[br][size=1]Posted at: July 19, 2006, 09:44:44 AM[/size][hr]help!!!
